Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a unique feature set designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at $180. This price reflects the value we place on providing exceptional products to our discerning customers. I believe this investment will pay off in terms of convenience and satisfaction. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll be happy to proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
